title: I really think that Teleport should be a boot enchantment
body:
The kind of strategic map mobility that TP offers is really interesting and (imo) fun to use *and to play against*. The trouble is that so many champions are forced to take exhaust/ignite/heal/etc, which are all almost totally combat related and offer no real strategic value except "is it off cooldown"?

Tele has *so much potential* to do really really cool things in ways the other spells just don't, and I think it's a real shame to not give everyone access to it. If it were a (reasonably expensive) boot enchant rather than a summoner spell, it would open up the option for people who can't usually take Teleport since they need to have a combat spell to have access to the strategic mobility that Teleport provides, and I really don't see how that would make the game anything but better.
